title: Donà Viscardini showcased by “Milano Finanza” for Competition Law
body:
• In April 2020, “Class Editori” published the volume “The Best Lawyers and The Best Law Firms corporate 2020” selected by “Milano Finanza”.
  • Donà Viscardini is listed for the category “Competition Law”. Also individually listed are attorneys Wilma Viscardini and Gabriele Donà.

title: Training course in European court law and labour law
body:
• The third meeting of the Course " Diritto dell’Unione Europea e diritto del lavoro nel contesto europeo” organized by “Avvocati Giuslavoristi Italiani” (AGI) will take place in the "virtual classroom" ( flyer and program ).
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà will talk about "The effects of the prejudicial judgments of the Court of Justice and the constraint of the precedents".

title: European Union Procedural Law Seminar
body:
• As part of Module II (“La tutela giurisdizionale”) del "Corso di perfezionamento e specializzazione in diritto dell’Unione europea” (v. “Nova" of October 30, 2019), the seminar "The Cancellation Action and the Disability Exception" was held in the "virtual classroom” ( flyer attached ).
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà spoke on the topic of the appeal of annulment under art. 263 TFEU.

title: “Scholarship” from the Union of European Lawyers (UAE) for young attorneys e licensed practitioners (deadline September 15, 2020)
body:
• L’U.A.E. (www.uae.lu) has launched an important initiative for young lawyers (U-35) of all Member States of the European Union. To apply, candidates must submit an essay on the topic of "A European Union of Justice", in English or French, by the September 15 deadline.
  • Click on the following link for more information and to participate: (https://www.scholarship-uae.lu/).
  • The winner (the decision will be made by a Jury on or before October 7) will be awarded a "scholarship" which includes (inter alia): free two-yea membership in the UAE and free attendance (inclusive of travel and lodging expenses) to the next Annual Assembly in Paris (November 13-14 ).

title: Attorney Gabriele Donà speaker at the Consiglio Nazionale Forense
body:
• The conference “Avvocati: diritti ed effettività della tutela” took place in Roma, at the Consiglio Nazionale Forense, ( in allegato la locandina ).
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà, in his role of President of the U.A.E., spoke on "The role of the Specialist Lawyer in European Union law in protecting rights before the National Courts and the European Court of Justice".

title: Attorney Wilma Viscardini at the Italian Embassy in Berlin to speak about Europ
body:
• A seminar “A Costituzione for Europe?”, organized by the local “Comites”, will take place at the Italian Embassy in Berlin (Tiergartenstraße 22) ( flyer attached ).
  • The event will be opened by His Excellency the Ambassador of Italy, Dr. Luigi Mattiolo.
  • Attorney Wilma Viscardini will discuss the topic with other authoritative personalities.
  • Information ( http://s467053659.website-start.de/eventi/10-12-2019-una-costituzione-per-l-europa-incontro-dibattito).

title: Celebrations marking the tenth anniversary of the Berlin Office of Studio legale Donà Viscardini
body:
• The celebrations for the tenth anniversary of our German headquarters will take place at our Offices in Berlin (Sybelstrasse 39), with the participation of all the partners of the Firm ( see flyer ).
  • The event will also be an opportunity for an interesting artistic vernissage

title: Assemblea Generale dell'"Unione degli Avvocati Europei" (U.A.E.) a Lussemburgo
body:
• The General Assembly of the U.A.E. will take place in Luxembourg, beginning on Friday, November 22 with a Conference on “Buying and managing a real property in Europe” (program EN , FR ).
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà, in his role of President of the U.A.E., will open the proceedings and will preside on the institutional events held on Saturday (General Assembly and Executive Comittee).
  • Complete Program https://www.generalassembly-uae.lu.

title: Incontro inaugurale a Milano del "Corso di perfezionamento e specializzazione in diritto dell’Unione europea"
body:
• Presso l’Aula Magna del Palazzo di giustizia di Milano, ha avuto inizio la prima edizione del "Corso di perfezionamento e specializzazione in diritto dell’Unione europea”, organizzato dall’Università degli Studi di Milano, in collaborazione con l’"Unione degli Avvocati Europei" (U.A.E.) (in allegato la locandina) .
  • L’incontro aveva come il titolo “L’avvocato specialista in diritto dell’Unione europea. Le ragioni di un corso di perfezionamento per una professione in continua evoluzione”.
  • L’Avv. Gabriele Donà, nella sua qualità di Presidente dell’U.A.E., ha inaugurato il Corso assieme ad altre personalità tra cui i vertici della Magistratura milanese.
  • Il Corso prevede 200 ore di lezione in due anni ( programma).

title: XXXIII Annual Congress of the "Union of European Lawyers" (U.A.E.) in Napoli
body:
• The XXXIII Annual Congress of the "Union of European Lawyers" took place in Naples with the theme “Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) in the European legal context: development prospects and sectoral applications” (program IT , FR , EN ).
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà, in his role of President of the U.A.E., opened the proceedings and moderated the second session "I mezzi alternativi di risoluzione delle controversie (ADR) e ulteriori esperienze settoriali o nazionali - Arbitrato”.
  • (Press Release (with photo) after the event.)

title: Attorney Wilma Viscardini protagonist at the Max-Planck-Institut
body:
• The international conference “The Contribution of the Legal Services of the European Institutions to European Union Law" took place in Frnakfurt hosted by the prestigious "Max-Planck-Institut für europäische Rechtsgeschichte", (flyer) .
  • Attorney Wilma Viscardini chaired the first Session on "The Legal Service of the European Commission”.
  • The first report of the second Session, entitled "Première Dame: Wilma Viscardini Donà, Legal Adviser of the European Commission”, was dedicated to the Attorney Viscardini as the first woman in history to join the European Commission's Legal Service.
  • ( Press Release from the Max-Plank-Institut after the event)

title: Course of specialization in Fiscal Law in Treviso
body:
• The second Course of specialization in European and international Fiscal Law, organized by the "Ordine dei Dottori commercialisti e degli Esperti contabili di Treviso" will take place in Treviso on May 29 (see attached flyer) .
  • L’Avv. Gabriele Donà will speak on the theme “The principle of ne bis in idem”.

title: “Scholarship” from the Union of European Lawyers (UAE) for young attorneys e licensed practitioners (deadline April 30 2019)
body:
• The UAE (www.uae.lu) has launched an important initiative for young lawyers (U-35) of all Member States of the European Union: to apply, candidates must submit an essay on the topic of Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR), in English or French, by the April 30 deadline.
  • Click on the following link for more information and to participate: (https://www.scholarship-uae.lu/).
  • The winner (the decision will be made by a Jury on or before May 20) will be awarded a "scholarship" which includes (inter alia): free two-year membership in the UAE, free attendance (inclusive of travel and lodging expenses) to the next Annual Congress, which will be held in Naples on June 28-29 with main topic “Alternative Dispute Resolution”.

title: Training Course on European Union Law in Milano
body:
• The third meeting of Module n. 2 “Tutela giurisdizionale e profili sostanziali” of Training Course on European Union Law, organized (among others) by the "Ordine degli Avvocati di Milano" and by "Fondazione Forense di Milano" took place in Milano (see attached flyer) .
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà spoke on the topic “Il rinvio pregiudiziale. Presupposti teorici e analisi casi pratici”.

title: L’AVV. GABRIELE DONÀ NOMINATO PRESIDENTE DELL'UNIONE DEGLI AVVOCATI EUROPEI
body:
• In occasione del Comitato Esecutivo dell’Unione degli Avvocati Europei (UAE), tenutosi il 1 dicembre a Lisbona, è stato eletto il nuovo “Bureau” dell’Associazione.
  • L’Avv. Gabriele Donà è stato nominato Presidente dell’UAE (si vedano le notizie pubblicate sulla stampa ==>
    -- (sole 24 ore)
    -- (il nordest quotidiano)
    -- (uae fr)
    -- (uae en)
  • Il prestigioso incarico durerà due anni. ==> Situs UAE

title: Conferenza “La giustizia europea come fattore per una più efficace tutela giudiziaria in materia tributaria” a Padova
body:
• Si svolgerà a Padova la Conferenza “La giustizia europea come fattore per una più efficace tutela giudiziaria in materia tributaria”, organizzata dalla “Camera Avvocati Tributaristi Veneto” (in allegato la locandina) .
  • L’Avv. Wilma Viscardini traccerà un ricordo del Prof. Trabucchi, anche in relazione alle comuni esperienze alla Corte di giustizia.
  • L’Avv. Gabriele Donà parlerà sul tema “Giudice tributario e rinvio pregiudiziale alla Corte di giustizia dell’Unione europea: aspetti procedurali e casistica giurisprudenziale”.

title: Conferenza “Le soupçon” a Marsiglia (FR)
body:
• Si svolgerà a Marsiglia la Conferenza internazionale “Le soupçon”, organizzata dall’Unione degli Avvocati europei (UAE) (in allegato la locandina) .
  • L’Avv. Gabriele Donà parlerà sul tema “L'article 48 de la Charte des droits fondamentaux de l'Union Européenne”.

title: CONFERENCE “ACCERTAMENTO TRIBUTARIO E PROFILI PENALISTICI” in MILAN
body:
• The conference “Accertamento tributario e profili penalistici” took place in Milan on September 12, 2018. The event was organized (among others) by the ”Ordine degli Avvocati di Milano”. (see the brochure) .
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà spoke on the theme "The principle of ne bis in idem in the European jurisprudence. Implications for fiscal assessments”.

title: “Scholarship” from the Union of European Lawyers for young lawyers (deadline May 15, 2018)
body:
• The UAE (www.uae.lu) has launched an important initiative for young lawyers (U-35) of all Member States of the European Union: to apply, candidates must submit an essay on the topic of Data Protection, in English or French, by the May 15 deadline.
  • Click on the following link for more information and to participate: (https://www.scholarship-uae.lu/).
  • The winner (the decision will be made by a Jury on or before May 21) will be awarded a "scholarship" which includes (inter alia): free two-yea membership in the UAE, free attendance (inclusive of travel and lodging expenses) to the next Annual Congress, which will be held in The Hague on June 15 (in the prestigious seat of the International Court of Justice) with main topic “Data Protection”.

title: XV STAGE ON EUROPEAN UNION LAW in ISCHIA
body:
• The 15th Stage of European Union Law "Andrea Cafiero" will be held in Ischia, organized by the Council of the Bar Association of Naples. See the attached poster for the entire program.
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà will talk on the theme "the implementation in Italy of Directive 2014/104/EU on actions for damages for infringements of competition law: framing and possible practical applications”.

title: XV STAGE ON EUROPEAN UNION LAW in ISCHIA
body:
• The 15th Stage of European Union Law "Andrea Cafiero" will be held in Ischia, organized by the Council of the Bar Association of Naples. See the attached poster for the entire program.
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà will talk on the theme "the implementation in Italy of Directive 2014/104/EU on actions for damages for infringements of competition law: framing and possible practical applications”.

title: Conference in Ferrara on preventive opposition in tax matters
body: • In Ferrara, Attorney Gabriele Donà intervenes at the Conference "Il contradditorio endo-procedimentale. Current Issues and Perspectives", organized by (among others), the "Unione dei giovani dottori commercialisti ed esperti contabili " of Ferrara (program attached) programma Ferrara 16_3_2017.pdf - - - .

title: Attorney Wilma Viscardini and Dr. Gaetano Donà awarded the “Premio Uniteis 2016"
body:
• At the proceedings of the General Assembly of Uniteis e.V. - which took place at "Longarone Fiere" on November 30 2016 - Attorney Wilma Viscardini and Dr. Gaetano Donà were awarded the “Premio Uniteis 2016 "for the high degree of professionalism and deep friendship demonstrated in 40 years of collaboration”.
,
  • International Fair of Artisanal Gelato

title: Attorney Gabriele Donà confirmed as Vice President of the European Lawyers Union
body:
• At the meeting of the Executive Committee of the Union of European Lawyers (UAE), held on November 21 2016 in Luxembourg, the new “Bureau” of the Union was elected.
  • Within the "Bureau", attorney Gabriele Donà has been confirmed as Vice President of the UAE (see article by Newsgroup ==> "Il Sole 24 Ore"
  • The prestigious mandate will last two years. ==> Situs UAE

title: Continuing Education Course on diritto penale in Milano
body: • In Milano, Lawyer Gabriele Donà will hold a lecture on “Giudice penale e rinvio pregiudiziale alla Corte di giustizia dell’Unione europea: aspetti procedurali e recente casistica giurisprudenziale”, as part of a Course organized by the LAF - Libera Associazione Forense (see the course poster) LAF Course in Milano.pdf - - -

title: Convegno in materia di diritto sportivo in Sicilia
body:
• A Convegno on the subject of “Discriminazioni nello sport e autonomia dei privati” was held in Fiumefreddo (Catania) on September 23. The Convegno was organized by th Commissione “Diritto dello sport”and by the Delegazione “Catania e Sicilia orientale” of the UAE (see the poster). Convegno UAE Fiumefreddo.pdf - - -
  • Lawyer Gabriele Donà spoke on “I principi di non discriminazione e di libertà di circolazione degli sportivi professionisti nella giurisprudenza della Corte di giustizia dell'Unione europea”.

title: XXX General Congress of the UAE
body:
• The XXX General Congress of the "Union of European Lawyers" (UAE) will take place in Alba Iulia in Romania. See the attached flyers for the complete program. Programme Alba Iulia - FR - - - Programme Alba Iulia - EN
  • Attorney Gabriele Donà, VicePresident of the UAE will speak on "Ne bis in idem et les pouvoirs d’imposer des amendes des autorités européennes et nationales de concurrence".

title: Round Table in Torino on some aspects of investigative fiscal proceedings
body: • In Torino, Avv. Gabriele Donà speaksat the Round Table “Obbligatorietà contraddittorio endoprocedimentale. Legislazione - Corte di cassazione - Corte di giustizia”, organized by "Centro di diritto penale tributario, comunitario e delle materie collegate" of Torino (see the conference poster) .

title: CONFERENCE ON CRIMINAL LAW TAX IN TORINO
body: • In Torino, Avv. Gabriele Donà speaks at the Conference on "The reform of tax offenses (Legislative Decree no. 158/2015)", organized by the National Association of Italian Tax Attorneys" and the "Centre for criminal tax law, EU law and related disciplines" of Torino (see the conference poster).

title: CONFERENCE ON TAX LAW IN ROVIGO
body:
• In Rovigo the seminar on "Il ne bis in idem in ambito tributario" hosted by the Department of Political Science, Law and International Studies of the University of Padova (See the conference poster).
  • Avv. Gabriele Donà speaks on the theme "The case law of the Court of Justice of the European Union on the subject of "ne bis in idem" between criminal and administrative sanctions.

title: Convegno di diritto europeo e internazionale in materia di immigrazione a Bari
body:
• Si svolgerà a Bari il Convegno “Madri migranti e minori: diritti e accoglienza - Nuove frontiere professionali per l’avvocato europeo" promosso dalla Commissione “Famiglia” dell’Unione degli Avvocati europei e da altri Enti indicati nella locandina allegata .
  • L’Avv. Gabriele Donà parlerà sul tema “La giurisprudenza della Corte di giustizia dell’Unione europea in materia d’asilo e immigrazione: recente casistica e aspetti procedurali”

title: Convegno tributario, fiscale, amministrativo a Cuneo
body:
• Si svolgerà a CUNEO il convegno "Novita' reati tributari - responsabilita' amministrativa abuso di diritto e frodi fiscali" promosso dal Centro Incontri Provincia di Cuneo con il patrocinio degli Enti, Istituzioni e Ordini indicati nella locandina allegata .
  • L’Avv. Gabriele Donà parlerà sul tema “La giurisprudenza della corte di giustizia dell'unione europea in materia di ne bis in idem tra sanzioni penali e amministrative”

title: Congress of European Union Lawyers in Malaga
body:
• In Malaga the annual congress of the Union of European Lawyers (UAE). See below the program flyer.
  • Lawyer Gabriele Donà, Vice President of the UAE, will speak Friday, June 19 on "The European Citizen on a Personal Level."
,
  • Malaga 2015 program
  • Programme Malaga 2015 fr
  • Program Malaga 2015 en

title: Conference May 29, 2015 in Creazzo (VI)
body:
• The center of criminal tax law hosts the conference "TAX ASSESSMENT AND CRIME IN THE DAILY PRACTICE".
  • Lawyer Gabriele Donà speaks on "The protection of the taxpayer before the Court of Justice of the European Union - Case studies".
  • Lawyer Wilma Viscardini lectures on "More Community principles for the protection of the taxpayer invocable before a national court - Case studies".
  • Here the poster of the conference. Conference Program of Creazzo

title: Attorney Gabriele Donà elected as Vice President of the European Lawyers Union
body:
• At the meeting of the Executive Committee of the Union of European Lawyers (UAE), held on November 29, 2016 in Cracovia, the new “Bureau” of the Union was elected.
  • Within the "Bureau", attorney Gabriele Donà has been appointed as Vice President of the UAE
  • The prestigious mandate will last two years. ==> Situs UAE

title: Attorney Wilma Viscardini awarded with the Golden Toga
body: • The Council of the Bar Association of Padua honors attorney Wilma Viscardini with the "Golden Toga" in recognition of her 50+ years of professional career.
